snippet: Thailand on Thursday confirmed its first known case of the deadly Middle East respiratory syndrome: a 75-year-old man who recently traveled from Oman.
abstract: Thailand confirms its first known case of Middle East respiratory syndrome, known as MERS; 75-year-old man under quarantine and is in stable condition.
lead_paragraph: Thailand on Thursday confirmed its first known case of the deadly Middle East respiratory syndrome: a 75-year-old man who recently traveled from Oman.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: First MERS Case Confirmed
